name: estudos-app-monorepo
description: App de Controle Total de Estudos - Mobile + Web
author: Natanael Rodrigues

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../web && npm install && cd ../mobile && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:web
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:web
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:web
scripts.clean: rimraf backend/node_modules backend/dist web/node_modules web/dist mobile/node_modules
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run install:all
